name: Ghostly Growth
description:
Features:

  • Mouse-only game 🐁
  • Collect ectoplasm 🟢
  • Since you're a ghost walls aren't in your way 👻
  • Exit when you grown enough! 💪
  • Music by AIVA 🤖

Known issues:

  • Cursor seems to not be visible (press windows key / alt-tab to allow the mouse cursor to be captured, mouse movement will angle the player towards a new direction)
  • Exit is not fully implemented
  • Run out of time with creating a nice layout for the level...

Made for Kenney Jam 2022 in 1 day.
